page.intro: Check out these additional articles on assessment in the classroom if you are interested, or save them for later.
page.content:
Check out these additional articles on assessment in the classroom, if you are interested, or save them for later review. We have included them here so you can pursue your interests. Assignment 3 asks you to read and reflect on two or three of these articles, so choose that assignment if you enjoy reading about the research that supports the strategies presented in this course!


- The list of Essential Questions
 
- The Concept of Formative Assessment (Boston, 2002)

- Formative Assessment and Next-Generation Assessment Systems: Are We Losing an Opportunity? (Heritage, 2010)

- Attributes Of Effective Formative Assessment (Council of Chief State School Officers, 2008)

- Formative Assessment: Examples of Practice (Council of Chief State School Officers, 2008)
 
- A Primer: Diagnostic, Formative, & Summative Assessment
